last_episode_to_air.name: Hataraku Otona no Renai Jijou The Animation
last_episode_to_air.overview: Monotonous life. Work days eat, sleep, work, keep repeating. Suddenly the heart says "Changing it is a good thing, But it's a little". A little change will be good, just a little challenging, trying to meet new people. Itsuki Oga is now available for adults. Starting from Miyu, Asuka, Tomoe, Yurika, Sayoko and also the owner of Cafe the Uratomi Ichiro. Because of his kindness that made many of the women around him become Harems.

name: Hataraku Otona no Renai Jijou The Animation

overview: Monotonous life. Work days eat, sleep, work, keep repeating. Suddenly the heart says "Changing it is a good thing, But it's a little". A little change will be good, just a little challenging, trying to meet new people. Itsuki Oga is now available for adults. Starting from Miyu, Asuka, Tomoe, Yurika, Sayoko and also the owner of Cafe the Uratomi Ichiro. Because of his kindness that made many of the women around him become Harems.
